pd_0_com_0text: Who do you want to be?
pd_1_com_0text: I want to be a noble!
pd_1_com_1text: I want to be a shoemaker!
pd_1_com_2text: I want to be a knight!
pd_1_com_3text: I want to be a baker!
pd_2_com_0text: Unfortunately, there are no legends about shoemakers. If you want to create a legend, you should choose to be somebody else!
pd_3_com_0text: Unfortunately, there are no legends about bakers. If you want to create a legend, you should choose to be somebody else!
pd_6_com_3text: I am in a forest glade.
pd_7_com_3text: I am in a forest glade.
pd_8_com_0text: You walk into the wasteland to...well, to do what exactly? A knight has no business in wasteland. That’s not what legends are made of!
pd_9_com_0text: Wait a second, something’s amiss. America won’t be discovered until 1492, when the Middle Ages have already passed! You can’t create your legend here
pd_10_com_0text: What are you carrying with you?
pd_11_com_0text: You walk into the wasteland to...well, to do what exactly? Wasteland is no place for a noble. That’s not what legends are made of!
pd_12_com_0text: Wait a second, something’s amiss. America won’t be discovered until 1492, when the Middle Ages have already passed! You can’t create your legend here
pd_13_com_0text: What are you carrying with you?
pd_14_com_0text: I have bow and arrows with me.
pd_14_com_1text: I wear the traditional gear of a pilgrim: scallop-shell, hat and staff.
pd_15_com_0text: I have bow and arrows with me.
pd_15_com_1text: I wear the traditional gear of a pilgrim: scallop-shell, hat and staff.
pd_16_com_0text: Who or what else is there?
pd_26_com_0text: What would you like to do?
pd_27_com_0text: … go on a pilgrimage to the Holy Land.
pd_28_com_0text: You are not dressed for a hunt: You are wearing the typical gear of a pilgrim – scallop-shell, pilgrim’s hat and pilgrim’s staff!
pd_29_com_0text: Becoming a saint won’t be that easy. You’d have to suffer through martyrdom or perform a miracle – or both!
pd_30_com_0text: You continue your pilgrimage towards the Holy Land. On your way you meet locals from the town you are currently in. What will you do?
pd_32_com_0text:
First you retreat to study the local language. After a while, you can communicate with others and find your way to the Holy Land.

Unfortunately though, nothing else happens that would be worthy of becoming a legend.
pd_33_com_0text: The inhabitants of this land do not understand the language you speak and accuse you of being a foreign spy! They torture you and hang you on an elderberry bush.
pd_34_com_0text:
Congratulations, you have created a legend! This is the legend of Saint Coloman, who was captured in Stockerau during his pilgrimage to the Holy Land. He died for his beliefs and was later proclaimed a saint.

However, this is not the legend of Klosterneuburg – would you like to try again to create this legend as well?
pd_35_com_0text: The Middle Ages are a too dangerous time to just walk into a forest without the proper equipment. Are you sure you didn’t bring anything?
pd_37_com_0text: What would you like to do?
pd_38_com_0text: What would you like to do?
pd_39_com_0text: What would you like to do?
pd_40_com_0text: What would you like to do?
pd_41_com_0text: What would you like to do?
pd_42_com_0text: What would you like to do?
pd_43_com_0text: What would you like to do?
pd_44_com_0text: What would you like to do?
pd_45_com_0text: What would you like to do?
pd_46_com_0text: What would you like to do?
pd_47_com_0text: What would you like to do?
pd_48_com_0text: What would you like to do?
pd_53_com_0text:
Your hunt is successful and you manage to kill a gigantic boar. You'll have a feast today!

Even though you brave the icy weather nothing worthy of a legend happens. You can try again, if you want.
pd_54_com_0text:
You are just investigating some boar tracks when suddenly your hunting dogs start barking. They run towards an elderbush where you witness a miracle:

Your wife lost her veil nine years ago, yet here it is, completely unscathed between the elderflowers! You are sure this must be a sign of God and you decide to build a monastery there.
pd_55_com_0text:
Congratulations, you have created a legend! This is the founding legend of Klosterneuburg Monastery – the very building you are in right now!

You managed to recreate the very legend that is depicted on the so-called Leopold-panels on your right. If you want, you can play again to create another legend.
pd_60_com_0text:
You keep wandering through the forest, looking for a suitable place to build a monastery. You find several locations, but none of them is special in any way and worse – none of them is blessed! Since it’s freezing cold you decide to go back home.

Unfortunately, nothing else happens that is worthy of a legend. Do you want to go back to try again?
pd_61_com_0text:
You keep wandering through the forest and decide to look for your wife’s veil that she lost nine years ago. However, there’s too much snow and therefore it’s impossible to spot the white veil. You decide to go home and try again in spring.

Unfortunately, nothing else happens that is worthy of a legend. Would you like to try again?
pd_65_com_0text: Will you hunt alone or with your hunting dogs?
pd_67_com_0text:
Your hunt is successful and you manage to kill a gigantic boar. You’ll have a feast today!

Even though your hunt was successful, nothing worthy of a legend happens. You can try again, if you want.
pd_70_com_0text:
You follow the dogs throughout the forest and behold – after a while they start barking and approach an elderbush where you discover a miracle:

Your wife lost her veil nine years ago, yet here it is, completely unscathed between the elderflowers! You are sure this must be a sign of God and you decide to build a monastery there.
pd_71_com_0text: You start your search, but soon you realise that the forest is too big and you have no chance of finding the veil on your own. What will you do next?
pd_72_com_0text: ... summon tracking dogs to help me!
pd_72_com_1text: … keep searching on my own, even if it takes hours!
pd_73_com_0text:
Congratulations, you have created a legend! This is the founding legend of Klosterneuburg Monastery – the very building you are in right now!

You managed to recreate the very legend that is depicted on the so-called Leopold-panels on your right. If you want, you can play again to create another legend.
pd_74_com_0text:
You keep wandering through the forest for hours but find no trace of the veil. When night starts to approach and it’s getting dark you decide to call it a day and come back tomorrow.

Unfortunately, nothing worthy of a legend has happened. Would you like to try again?
pd_75_com_0text:
You keep wandering through the forest, looking for a suitable place to build a monastery. You find several locations, but none of them is special in any way and worse – none of them is blessed! You decide to try again another day.

Unfortunately, nothing worthy of a legend has happened. Would you like to try again?
pd_82_com_0text: What are you carrying with you?
pd_83_com_0text: I have bow and arrows with me.
pd_83_com_1text: I wear the traditional gear of a pilgrim: scallop-shell, hat and staff.
pd_84_com_0text: The Middle Ages are a too dangerous time to just walk into a forest without the proper equipment. Are you sure you didn’t bring anything?
